api_list.api_description: Returns price history for selected pair.

optional_parameters.name: hours
optional_parameters.description: Number of hours back to get prices for.

optional_parameters.name: data_points
optional_parameters.description: Number of data points to retrieve.

query: Can you retrieve the 15-minute interval trading data for BTC/USD on Gemini and also provide the price history for Bitcoin to Litecoin exchange on N.exchange over the last hour?
